name: When Crabs March Together
description:
Made for Brackey's Game Jam 5!

The Evil Crabs are attacking: Trying to ruin you and your Friend's sandcastles! Use your knowledge of mechanical engineering to build systematically stronger Water Balloon Defense Towers to annihilate the sand-hating scum. Also, you have a sword, because tower defenses should be fun at all times. Make sure to pick up money to fuel your enterprise!

Controls:

Player 1: Use WASD to control Froggo,

V to Interact, build Towers and Accept in Menus

C to use your Sword/Decline in Menus

Player 1: Use Arrow Keys to control Roboto,

< or ,  to build towers and Accept in Menus

> or .  to use your Sword/Decline in Menus

Escape to Pause

Attack other players with your sword to give them money

Interact with a tower to access the upgrade menu

Both players need to hold the attack button to start the next wave

You cannot place towers in Water.

Credits:

Lead Designer + Art: Spencer Gordon

Programming+ Music/Sounds : Antonio Martinez

Additional Programming Assistance: Alex Lopez
